verses.verse: And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> against <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H182><s%> of the <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he had <S%H3947>married:<s%> for he had <S%H3947>married<s%> an <S%H3569>Ethiopian<s%> <S%H802>woman.<s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> Has the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> indeed <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> by <S%H4872>Moses?<s%> has he not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> by us? And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> it.

(Now the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H6035>meek,<s%> above <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth.<s%>)

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H6597>suddenly<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and to <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> <S%H3318>Come<s%> out you <S%H7969>three<s%> to the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation.<s%> And they <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> in the <S%H5982>pillar<s%> of the <S%H6051>cloud,<s%> and <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle,<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam:<s%> and they <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> forth.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> my <S%H1697>words:<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> there be a <S%H5030>prophet<s%> among you, I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will make myself <S%H3045>known<s%> to him in a <S%H4758>vision,<s%> and will <S%H1696>speak<s%> to him in a <S%H2472>dream.<s%>
My <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> is not <S%H3651>so,<s%> <S%H1931>who<s%> is <S%H539>faithful<s%> in all my <S%H1004>house.<s%>

With him will I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6310>mouth<s%> to <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> even <S%H4758>apparently,<s%> and not in <S%H2420>dark<s%> <S%H2420>speeches;<s%> and the <S%H8544>similitude<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall he <S%H5027>behold:<s%> <S%H4069>why<s%> then were you not <S%H3372>afraid<s%> to <S%H1696>speak<s%> against my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H4872>Moses?<s%>
And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against them; and he <S%H3212>departed.<s%>

And the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> <S%H5493>departed<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> became <S%H6879>leprous,<s%> white as <S%H7950>snow:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6437>looked<s%> on <S%H4813>Miriam,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> she was <S%H6879>leprous.<s%>

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H994>Alas,<s%> my <S%H113>lord,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you, <S%H7896>lay<s%> not the <S%H2403>sin<s%> on us, <S%H834>wherein<s%> we have done <S%H2973>foolishly,<s%> and <S%H834>wherein<s%> we have <S%H2398>sinned.<s%>

Let her not be as one <S%H4191>dead,<s%> of whom the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H398>consumed<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> he <S%H3318>comes<s%> out of his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H7358>womb.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7495>Heal<s%> her <S%H4994>now,<s%> O <S%H410>God,<s%> I <S%H4994>beseech<s%> you.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> If her <S%H1>father<s%> had but <S%H3417>spit<s%> in her <S%H6440>face,<s%> should she not be <S%H3637>ashamed<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days?<s%> let her be <S%H5462>shut<s%> out from the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> that let her be <S%H622>received<s%> in again.

And <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H5462>shut<s%> out from the <S%H4264>camp<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> not <S%H5704>till<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> was <S%H622>brought<s%> in again.
And <S%H310>afterward<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5265>removed<s%> from <S%H2698>Hazeroth,<s%> and <S%H2583>pitched<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H6290>Paran.<s%>
